Text:
BS, this is not HD.  The quality sucks.  Since when is 640X480 considered HD?  Total bitrate 871 kbps also sucks.  Some of the vids are 576X432.  Some vids have 30fps, some have 23.  WTF?

NOT HD QUALITY.  Looks like junk on a 15in computer monitor let alone a 50in flat screen tv.

You'd be better off getting someone with Parkinsons disease to hand draw each panel while smoking crack...probably end up with high quality.
